step1.title: What's your name and how can we contact you?
step1.description: We need your details to send you the complete presentation package and stay in touch during implementation. Example: John Smith, XYZ Company, john@company.com, +1 234 567 890

step2.title: What is your product?
step2.description: Briefly describe what you offer and what problem your product solves. This is the foundation for creating all materials. Example: 'A project management application that automates reporting and saves time for project teams'

step3.title: Who is your target audience?
step3.description: Define exactly who your customers are, what their characteristics are, and why they need your product. The better we understand your target audience, the more effective communication we'll create.

fields.targetNeeds: Why do they need your product?

placeholders.targetCustomers: e.g. Small business owners employing 10-50 people who...
placeholders.targetNeeds: They waste time on..., They have problems with..., They need...

step4.title: How long should the video be?
step4.description: Choose the optimal video length. Shorter videos (30-60s) are ideal for social media, longer ones (90-120s) allow detailed product explanation. We recommend 60-90 seconds for best conversion.

step5.title: What video style do you prefer?
step5.description: Choose the type of production that best fits your brand and budget. We can combine several styles for the best effect.

animation2d.title: 2D Animation
animation2d.description: Modern graphics and illustrations in motion

mixed.title: Mixed
mixed.description: Combination of animation and screen recordings

step5.customPlaceholder: I would like the video to...

step6.title: What key information should be in the video?
step6.description: Select sections that must be in the video. We typically recommend the structure: Problem → Solution → How it works → Benefits → CTA. You can select all needed elements.

problem.title: Problem you're solving
problem.description: Hook - what is the customers' problem

presentation.title: Product/solution presentation
presentation.description: What you offer and how it works

howItWorks.title: How your product works
howItWorks.description: Step by step or main features

cta.title: Call to action
cta.description: What should the customer do next

step6.notesPlaceholder: Are there any special information that must be in the video?

step7.title: What is the Landing Page goal?
step7.description: Define the main page goal. This will help us design the appropriate structure and call-to-action. A landing page can have multiple goals, but one should be primary.
step7.additionalPlaceholder: Are there any additional page goals?

step8.title: What sections should be on the Landing Page?
step8.description: Select sections to be included on the page. A standard landing page contains: Hero, Product description, Benefits, Social proof, CTA. You can add more sections as needed.

hero.title: Hero section (header)
hero.description: Main message and CTA at the top of the page

description.title: Product description
description.description: What you offer, how it works

benefits.title: Benefits / Features
benefits.description: Why it's worth it, main advantages

timeline.title: Timeline / Process
timeline.description: How collaboration looks step by step

step8.otherPlaceholder: Other sections you want to add...

step9.title: Do you have visual preferences for the Landing Page?
step9.description: Choose the visual style of the page and provide company colors if you have them. We can also get inspired by other pages you like.

modern.title: Modern Tech
modern.description: Gradients, animations, futuristic - SaaS, technology, innovation

minimal.title: Minimalist
minimal.description: Clean, lots of white space - Elegance, simplicity, premium

colorful.title: Colorful and Dynamic
colorful.description: Vibrant colors, energy, young brand - Creativity, social media, lifestyle

professional.title: Professional Business
professional.description: Classic, trust, corporate - B2B, consulting, finance

step9.graphicsPlaceholder: If you have graphic materials, add them here
step9.inspirationPlaceholder: Provide links to pages you like and write what specifically...

step10.title: What communication tone do you prefer?
step10.description: Choose the style we should write texts in. This will affect the video language, landing page content, and overall brand communication. You can choose a combination of styles.
step10.guidelinesPlaceholder: Are there words/phrases we should use or avoid? Any examples of communication you like?

step11.title: What are the 3 main benefits of your product?
step11.description: List the most important customer benefits. Not features, but concrete benefits - what will the customer gain? Example: Instead of 'Dashboard with analytics' → 'You'll save 5 hours per week on reporting'

placeholders.title1: e.g. You'll save 10 hours per week on...
placeholders.title2: e.g. You'll increase conversion by 40% through...
placeholders.description: Why is this important? What specific effect?

step12.title: Do you have competition? How do you differ from them?
step12.description: Knowledge about competition will help us better highlight your unique value. Don't worry, we won't speak badly about competitors - we'll simply emphasize what makes you stand out.

fields.targetFit: For whom are you a better choice?

placeholders.competitors: e.g. Asana, Trello, Monday.com - project management tools
placeholders.competitiveAdvantage: How are you different? What do you do better? What do you have that others don't? Example: 'We're the only ones offering AI-powered reporting automation'
placeholders.targetFit: For what type of customers are you the ideal solution?

step13.title: What materials can you provide?
step13.description: The more materials you provide, the better we'll capture your brand character. Check what you can provide - we'll create the rest for you.
step13.uploadPlaceholder: Drag files here or click to select
step13.acceptedFormats: We accept: PDF, DOC, DOCX, PNG, JPG, SVG
step13.linksPlaceholder: If materials are online, provide links (Google Drive, Dropbox, etc.)

step14.title: When do you need the complete package?
step14.description: We typically deliver the complete package within 7-10 business days. If you need it faster or have a specific deadline (e.g., investor presentation, trade show), let us know.
step14.keyDatesPlaceholder: e.g. 'Investor presentation December 15', 'Industry trade show January 20', 'Product launch in February'
